bibl.title: P45 and Codex W Revisited.
bibl.note: P. Chester Beatty I (= van Haelst 371; LDAB 2980). - A fresh quantitative analysis of ca. 50 test passages confirms and reinforces Hurtado's significant result. There is indeed a close textual relationship between P45 and Codex W [Washingtonianus, W 032].

bibl.title: "Mark, Manuscripts, and Monotheism. Essays in Honor of Larry W. Hurtado"

bibl.seg: Tommy Wasserman, P45 and Codex W Revisited.
Dieter Roth & Chris Keith, Mark, Manuscripts, and Monotheism. Essays in Honor of Larry W. Hurtado = Library of New Testament Studies. 528 (London - New York, 2015) pp. 130-158, 5 tabl.

P. Chester Beatty I (= van Haelst 371; LDAB 2980). - A fresh quantitative analysis of ca. 50 test passages confirms and reinforces Hurtado's significant result. There is indeed a close textual relationship between P45 and Codex W [Washingtonianus, W 032].
